title: Is ping misuse reportable?
body: Like when someone uses the question mark ping on you when you die?

replies.body: you can try it but you likely will get your report weight reduced from false reporting

> [{quoted}](name=MUSHROOM MIDGET,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BEjijpE9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-22T14:39:23.922+0000)
>
> you can try it but you likely will get your report weight reduced from false reporting

Well that's stupid. Why isn't misusing pings to harass people who died reportable?

I guess Riot just wants us to take it up the butt, which is why they don't even give us an option to mute pings in the same way you can mute chat from people.

e.g. If I mute someone's chat, it disappears. Only thing you can do with pings is turn down the volume.

yeah dude i agree with you.  its really toxic the way the ? ping gets abused.  but their automated system isnt going to pick up on it so they will think your report is fake.

i just want to have a way to mute pings.

You CAN report it. But unlikely to be effective, Riot gives players the tools and yes some players use them to harass but its hard to actually PROVE that, beyond a doubt. I ping other lanes when I see someone go missing frmo mid, even as a top laner or elsewhere so I can make sure my team is aware of it. Some people might feel this is harassing them while they are in lane, but I am using the tool as intended. 

Thats what causes the issue
If they do it consistently (or spam it), I'll generally report them for harassment and/or spam with an explanation in the comments.

> yep ping spamming is reportable.

This isn't ping spamming though. It's ping misuse for harassment.
Haha, they need a "What the fuck noob?" ping so I don't have to use the missing one.
